main.name: Maco
main.description: I love to learn new things as much as I love coffee. Building nice animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences is definitely my goal.
main.bio: My name is Maco and I am a Junior FullStack Javascript Developer. I am a React and Node enthusiast. When I am not coding, I like to walk around and get lost in the city, practice wakeboard and other extreme sports. I could not imagine a day without music. Let's grab a coffee and start a new journey !
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me, I'll be glad to chat with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Learning HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, SCSS, JS, NodeJs, ReactJs and more.
Learned the basics of Economy and Social Science.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: Design and develop a web application, understand and formalize the needs of a client, integrate agile methods.

work.title: Wakeboard Instructor
work.description: I had to train the kids from the club and teach wakeboard bascis to begginers. I also had to do the daily maintenance on the machine and the boards.

work.title: Rental Team Manager
work.description: I was in charge on the rental part of the shop, including the setup of the shop, the workflow, and the workshop.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

testimonials.text: The only thing that matters in software is the experience of the user.
